trans-unit.source: Accesses the cryptography configuration information.
trans-unit.target: 存取加密組態資訊。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the simple names recognized by this class and the default algorithm implementations to which they map.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示這個類別和它們所對應的預設演算法實作所辨識的簡單名稱。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can map other implementations to these names, as described in [Mapping Algorithm Names to Cryptography Classes](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/map-algorithm-names-to-cryptography-classes.md).
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以將對應其他實作這些名稱中所述[將演算法名稱對應至密碼編譯類別](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/map-algorithm-names-to-cryptography-classes.md)。

trans-unit.source: Simple name
trans-unit.target: 簡單名稱

trans-unit.source: Algorithm implementation
trans-unit.target: 演算法實作

trans-unit.source: 3DES, Triple DES, TripleDES, System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES
trans-unit.target: 3DES、 三重 DES、 TripleDES、 System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES

trans-unit.source: AES, System.Security.Cryptography.AesCryptoServiceProvider
trans-unit.target: AES, System.Security.Cryptography.AesCryptoServiceProvider

trans-unit.source: AesManaged, System.Security.Cryptography.AesManaged
trans-unit.target: AesManaged System.Security.Cryptography.AesManaged

trans-unit.target: System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm

trans-unit.source: DES, System.Security.Cryptography.DES
trans-unit.target: DES、 System.Security.Cryptography.DES

trans-unit.source: DSA, System.Security.Cryptography.DSA
trans-unit.target: DSA, System.Security.Cryptography.DSA

trans-unit.source: ECDH, ECDiffieHellman, ECDiffieHellmanCng, System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng
trans-unit.target: ECDH, ECDiffieHellman, ECDiffieHellmanCng, System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng

trans-unit.source: ECDsa, ECDsaCng, System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsaCng
trans-unit.target: ECDsa, ECDsaCng, System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsaCng

trans-unit.source: System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm
trans-unit.target: System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm

trans-unit.source: HMAC, System.Security.Cryptography.HMAC
trans-unit.target: HMAC System.Security.Cryptography.HMAC

trans-unit.target: HMACMD5, System.Security.Cryptography.HMACMD5

trans-unit.target: HMACRIPEMD160, System.Security.Cryptography.HMACRIPEMD160

trans-unit.source: HMACSHA1, System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA1
trans-unit.target: HMACSHA1 System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA1

trans-unit.source: HMACSHA256, System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA256
trans-unit.target: HMACSHA256, System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA256

trans-unit.target: HMACSHA384, System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA384

trans-unit.source: HMACSHA512, System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA512
trans-unit.target: HMACSHA512, System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA512

trans-unit.target: System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm

trans-unit.target: MACTripleDES、 System.Security.Cryptography.MACTripleDES

trans-unit.target: MD5 System.Security.Cryptography.MD5

trans-unit.source: System.Security.Cryptography.MD5Cng
trans-unit.target: System.Security.Cryptography.MD5Cng

trans-unit.source: RandomNumberGenerator
trans-unit.target: RandomNumberGenerator

trans-unit.source: RC2, System.Security.Cryptography.RC2
trans-unit.target: RC2 System.Security.Cryptography.RC2

trans-unit.source: Rijndael, System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael
trans-unit.target: Rijndael System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael

trans-unit.source: RIPEMD160, RIPEMD-160, System.Security.Cryptography.RIPEMD160Managed
trans-unit.target: RIPEMD160, RIPEMD-160, System.Security.Cryptography.RIPEMD160Managed

trans-unit.target: SHA、 SHA1、 System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1

trans-unit.source: System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm
trans-unit.target: System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use members of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的成員<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The algorithm to map to.
trans-unit.target: 要對應的演算法。

trans-unit.source: An array of names to map to the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 要對應至演算法的名稱陣列。

trans-unit.source: Adds a set of names to algorithm mappings to be used for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 在演算法對應中加入一組名稱，供目前的應用程式定義域使用。

trans-unit.source: The specified mappings take precedence over the built-in mappings and the mappings in the machine.config file.
trans-unit.target: 指定的對應優先於內建的對應和 machine.config 檔中的對應。

trans-unit.source: The mappings are used to prevent partially trust code from using trusted cryptographic operations.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止部分信任程式碼使用受信任的密碼編譯作業會使用對應。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="algorithm" /> or <paramref name="names" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="algorithm" /> 或 <paramref name="names" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="algorithm" /> cannot be accessed from outside the assembly.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="algorithm" /> 無法從組件外部存取。

trans-unit.source: -or-
One of the entries in the <paramref name="names" /> parameter is empty or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="names" /> 參數中的一個項目是空的或 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The object identifier (OID) to map to.
trans-unit.target: 要對應的物件識別項 (OID)。

trans-unit.source: An array of names to map to the OID.
trans-unit.target: 要對應至物件識別項的名稱陣列。

trans-unit.source: Adds a set of names to object identifier (OID) mappings to be used for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 在物件識別項 (OID) 對應中加入一組名稱，供目前的應用程式定義域使用。

trans-unit.source: The specified mappings take precedence over the built-in mappings and the mappings in the machine.config file.
trans-unit.target: 指定的對應優先於內建的對應和 machine.config 檔中的對應。

trans-unit.source: The mappings are used to prevent partially trust code from using trusted cryptographic operations.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止部分信任程式碼使用受信任的密碼編譯作業會使用對應。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="oid" /> or <paramref name="names" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="oid" /> 或 <paramref name="names" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the entries in the <paramref name="names" /> parameter is empty or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="names" /> 參數中的一個項目是空的或 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the runtime should enforce the policy to create only Federal Information Processing Standard (FIPS) certified algorithms.
trans-unit.target: 表示執行階段是否應該強制執行原則，以限制只建立已通過聯邦資訊處理標準 (FIPS) 的演算法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to enforce the policy; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要強制執行原則的話為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If `false`, any algorithm may be created.
trans-unit.target: 如果`false`，可能會建立任何演算法。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the specified cryptographic object.
trans-unit.target: 指定密碼編譯物件的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The simple name of the cryptographic object of which to create an instance.
trans-unit.target: 要建立執行個體的密碼編譯物件的簡單名稱。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the specified cryptographic object.
trans-unit.target: 指定密碼編譯物件的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the specified cryptographic object.
trans-unit.target: 指定密碼編譯物件的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For a list of simple names recognized by this class, see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig>.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個類別所辨識的簡單名稱的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to call the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig.CreateFromName%2A> method to create a new SHA1 provider.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig.CreateFromName%2A>方法來建立新的 SHA1 提供者。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="name" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The algorithm described by the <paramref name="name" /> parameter was used with Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) mode enabled, but is not FIPS compatible.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 參數描述的演算法，在聯邦資訊處理標準 (FIPS) 模式啟用的情況下使用，但是和 FIPS 並不相容。

trans-unit.source: The simple name of the cryptographic object of which to create an instance.
trans-unit.target: 要建立執行個體的密碼編譯物件的簡單名稱。

trans-unit.source: The arguments used to create the specified cryptographic object.
trans-unit.target: 用來建立指定的密碼編譯物件的引數。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the specified cryptographic object with the specified arguments.
trans-unit.target: 建立具有指定引數的指定密碼編譯物件的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the specified cryptographic object.
trans-unit.target: 指定密碼編譯物件的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For a list of simple names recognized by this class, see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig>.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個類別所辨識的簡單名稱的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to call the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig.CreateFromName%2A> method to initialize a new RSA provider instance accessing the `TestContainer` key container.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig.CreateFromName%2A>方法來初始化新 RSA 提供者執行個體存取`TestContainer`金鑰容器。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="name" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The algorithm described by the <paramref name="name" /> parameter was used with Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) mode enabled, but is not FIPS compatible.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 參數描述的演算法，在聯邦資訊處理標準 (FIPS) 模式啟用的情況下使用，但是和 FIPS 並不相容。

trans-unit.source: The OID to encode.
trans-unit.target: 要編碼的 OID。

trans-unit.source: Encodes the specified object identifier (OID).
trans-unit.target: 編碼指定的物件識別項 (OID)。

trans-unit.source: A byte array containing the encoded OID.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列，包含已編碼的 OID。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to call the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig.EncodeOID%2A> method to encode the specified object identifier.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig.EncodeOID%2A>編碼指定的物件識別碼的方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="str" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="str" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while encoding the OID.
trans-unit.target: 編碼 OID 時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The simple name of the algorithm for which to get the OID.
trans-unit.target: 要為其取得 OID 的演算法簡單名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object identifier (OID) of the algorithm corresponding to the specified simple name.
trans-unit.target: 取得對應至指定簡單名稱的演算法之物件識別項 (OID)。

trans-unit.source: The OID of the specified algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 指定演算法的 OID。

trans-unit.source: For a list of simple names recognized by this class, see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig>.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個類別所辨識的簡單名稱的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to call the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig.MapNameToOID%2A> method to retrieve an object identifier (OID) from the string name of the SHA1 algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig.MapNameToOID%2A>SHA1 演算法的字串名稱從擷取的物件識別碼 (OID) 的方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="name" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。
